Class ClientList

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • serverchat.ClientList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClientList
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class represent a collection that holds list of clients
